author: bodewig
msg: Added a type attribute to <execon> and <chmod>. It can take the values
"file", "dir" and "both" and deteremines, whether the task should work
on plain files only (the default), directories only or both.

author: bodewig
msg: If the output has not been redirected (via -logfile) write error
messages to stderr instead of stdout.

author: bodewig
msg: Javadoc's destDir attribute should now work again.

author: bodewig
msg: Problems with the .bat files on Win98.
